TopicTitle: Where would I post a thread about...

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I want to post a tutorial on adding ksp to the app menus on some Linux distros, specificity Mint.

I thought about the tutorials section, but that is for gameplay tutorials.

Which category would I post it in?

It depends on how you read it. If you read it "Gameplay Questions and Tutorials" then yes, but if you read it "Gameplay Questions" and "Tutorials", then it would go there perfectly.

Other than that the Linux Thread is in unmodded support.
It would likely be best in the Support section in my opinion, but the Tutorials section is also rather appropriate in this case.
